page.title: 03 Introduction (continued)
page.content: In part of our area runs the newly built M54 Motorway. Also in our area is a prewar estate which was built in the 1910's called Fordhouses which is part of Wolverhampton. Pendeford is a large urban area situated on the border of Wolverhampton in Staffordshire. During the past 10 years a new estate has been built and is rapidly growing larger. A few miles out of Pendeford is a large caravan park which comforatably accommodates 60/70 caravans. Running on the border of the caravan park is a canal called the Staffordshire and Worcestershire Union Canal.
